item.title: Sweet Curry
item.description: The Sweet Curry is a pedal powered version of its electrified brother the Spicy Curry. Sure to be an instant crowd favorite, the Sweet Curry boasts a super strong but light aluminium frame of oversized tubing, 20‚Äù rear wheel and extra long rear deck for maximum hauling capacity, ready to haul up to 130kg.
